MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.15pm to repair an underground cable located outside 58 Oxgangs Brae and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.53pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
